thread.title: Letter from top Biden aide lays out platform for potential 2016 run
thread.title_full: Letter from top Biden aide lays out platform for potential 2016 run - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Letter from top Biden aide lays out platform for potential 2016 run
text: Vice President Joe Biden would run an optimistic and unscripted " campaign from the heart " based on restoring middle-class opportunity, one of his top political advisers said Thursday, laying out for the first time the argument Biden would make if he runs for president. ...
